Megaton watched the three arm themselves for battle, he found it hard to
believe that any of these bots wanted death so badly. Then he saw in thier
eyes an unmistakable loyalty, or maybe fear that showed that these bots were
Megatrons to command until thier sparks were extinguished. "This battle
would be senseless, I agree, but what would be in it to agree to follow
you?" The mutant was just learning about the Predacon system, he'd
origionally thought that they strictly responded to strength, now he saw
something different.

He decided that knowledge about his opponent would be preferable to battle
at the moment, and knew that there was only one way to earn respect. "I have
more power than you could possibly imagine. Allow me to show give you a
sample of what I can do for this army." The dragon opened his mouth and
launched five fireballs at Waspinator. (I've been waiting months to do
that.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 5:49 AM
Subject: Re: Following Megatrons troops.


>     Megatron began laughing, and rather hard too. So hard in fact a small
> landslide occured because of the echo. Aerostreak and Waspinator joined in
> the humor as well.
>     "You stupid idiot, who do you think youre dealing with?" Megatron
said,
> and snapped his arm cannon into fireing position. "I suggest you
surrender,
> or die in this artic hell hole. You could be a very valuable asset to the
> Predacon team. Your large, strong, well armed, and Im assuming you must be
> somewhat intelligent to even think about trying to usurp me."
>     Waspinator and Aerostreak raised thier weapons as well, armed for
killing
> the imposter.
>     "So, what do you say? Will you join us or will you force me and my
troops
> to blow you bit by imposterous bit?" He said, raising one eye brow to the
> dragon.
>
>
>
>
